co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is Co0.85Se.
light source: A 300 W Xenon Lamp with 420 nm cut-off filter was used as the light source in the experiment.
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is a solution of triethanolamine (TEOA)/water/acetonitrile (1 mL/2 mL/3 mL).
